About the Company: Rodium Realty is an avantgarde organization in the field of property development, project management, building management and build to suit solutions. The company is engaged in the development and construction of residential, office space, retail and mixed use projects by integrating various requirements and specific demands of customers. The company undertakes real estate development projects on property development basis and project management basis. Its Property Development includes activities starting from the conceptualization stage to completion stage.
